name: Mutant Gate
detailed_description:
To Desura users who spent money on "Dead Colony"

Send us your Desura receipt at founder@secondvarietygames.com , and you will get a free Steam key for "Mutant Gate", because "Mutant Gate" is an upgraded and revised version of "Dead Colony".


About the Game

After 10 years of sleep, Dr. Green wakes up in cryoprison on an Earth colony overrun by Mutants (former humans). Green has a past to atone for, but he also must find his estranged daughter Anna. On his way through the ravaged planet, he will be faced with intense combat, encounter survivors, and feel the wind of adventure. Will this story have a happy ending?
...
Mutant Gate is written on its own ASCII engine, its 4-hour campaign featuring a multitude of scripted sequences within 2D, Doom-style levels. There's also an option for hybrid ASCII/tile visuals. The game auto-detects Steam Deck and supports its controls.

short_description: After years in cryoprison, Dr. Green awakens on a mutant-infested Earth colony. Seeking redemption and his estranged daughter Anna, he battles through a ravaged planet in a 4-hour campaign of intense combat, encounters, and adventure. Mutant Gate has ASCII visuals & Steam Deck support.
